roleset.name: to pay or furnish money for costs/expenses

role.descr: expenses costs of what? entity purchased when separate mention from arg 1.

example.name: Typical Transitive
example.text: If they are not claimed in seven days, they are sent far away to the Neverland *PRO* to defray expenses.

example.name: With Arg 2 embedded in arg 1
example.text: They-1 were able to charge travelers using the turnpike and *-1 defray the costs of upkeep and improvement of the road.
example.arg: the costs of upkeep and improvement of the road

predicate.note: Frames file for 'defray' based on survey of sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. No VerbNet entry. Comparison with 'furnish.'
